CustomField.formula: "CUB_" & IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaign_Type__c, "Corporate Lead"), "企個名單", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaign_Type__c, "Prospect Lead"), "拓客名單", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaign_Type__c, "General Lead"), "一般名單", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaign_Type__c, "Oversea TMRAC Campaign"), "Oversea TMRAC Campaign", "") & IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaign_Type__c, "Oversea General Campaign"), "Oversea General Campaign", "") & "_" & RIGHT(LEFT(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)), 4), 2) & RIGHT(LEFT(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)), 7), 2)
CustomField.label: 行銷活動編號
